Jermaine Lamarr Cole

Cole is an American hip hop recording artist, songwriter and record producer who has a net worth of $60 million. J. Cole was the first artist signed to Jay-Z's label Roc Nation. He is consistently one of the highest-paid rappers in the world. Cole is an American hip hop recording artist, songwriter and record producer who has a net worth of $60 million. J.
